backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend update to render black paragraph text in the Women empowerment section.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their roles and features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/text/border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with BrandProvider and CartProvider.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context managing cart items with add, remove, update, clear operations and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar showing route links and cart badge count.
frontend/src/components/BrandProvider.ts: React context handling editable brand name and logo with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with editable brand name, logo upload, and desktop/mobile navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product info with optional quantity controls and add‑to‑cart functionality.
Horizontal scroll carousel rendering ProductCards with left/right navigation buttons.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines Product interface and exports arrays of thepla products, other products, and product categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using React Query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity loading using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables and base styling including light/dark color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Renders the user account page with links to contact, FAQ, and placeholder sections.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, allowing quantity changes, item removal, and showing totals.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Shows product categories with carousels for theplas and other products.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with phone, location, email, and Instagram fields using icons and controlled inputs.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: FAQ page displaying expandable question-and-answer items with toggle state.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, story content, and buy-now logic adding a default product to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Notifications page rendering a list of static notification cards with icons and timestamps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking features, requests, and configuration for ongoing work.
